001package org.nasdanika.emf.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.function.BiFunction;
006
007import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EMap;
008import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
009import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EClass;
010import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.ENamedElement;
011import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EReference;
012import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EStructuralFeature;
013import org.nasdanika.common.NasdanikaException;
014import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
015import org.nasdanika.persistence.MapAttribute;
016import org.nasdanika.persistence.Marker;
017import org.nasdanika.persistence.ObjectLoader;
018
019/**
020 * Loads {@link EMap} of references using loader.
021 * @author Pavel
022 *
023 */
024public class ReferenceMap<K,V> extends MapAttribute<K,V> {
025
026        private ReferenceFactory valueFactory;
027        
028        /**
029         * @param key
030         * @param isDefault
031         * @param required
032         * @param defaultValue
033         * @param description
034         * @param resolver
035         * @param referenceType Reference type if the reference is homogenous, i.e. its type is known beforehand.
036         * @param exclusiveWith
037         */
038        public ReferenceMap(
039                        Object key, 
040                        boolean isDefault, 
041                        boolean required, 
042                        Map<K,V> defaultValue, 
043                        String description, 
044                        EClass eClass,
045                        EReference eReference,
046                        EObjectLoader resolver,
047                        boolean referenceSupplierFactory,
048                        BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider,
049                        Object... exclusiveWith) {
050                super(key, isDefault, required, defaultValue, description, exclusiveWith);
051                EStructuralFeature valueFeature = eReference.getEReferenceType().getEStructuralFeature("value");
052                if (valueFeature instanceof EReference) {
053                        this.valueFactory = new ReferenceFactory(eClass, (EReference) valueFeature, eReference.getName(), resolver, referenceSupplierFactory, keyProvider);
054                }
055        }
056        
057        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
058        @Override
059        protected V createValue(ObjectLoader loader, K key, Object value, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
060                if (valueFactory == null) {
061                        return super.createValue(loader, key, value, base, progressMonitor, markers);
062                }
063                
064                List<?> result = valueFactory.create(loader, value, base, progressMonitor, markers);
065                if (result.size() == 0) {
066                        return null;
067                }
068                
069                if (result.size() == 1) {
070                        return (V) result.get(0);
071                }
072                throw new NasdanikaException("Expected result size of 0 or 1, got " + result.size() + ":" + result);            
073        }
074        
075}
